import React, { useState } from "react"; import './Contact.css'; const Contact = () => { const [data, updateData] = useState({ fname: "", lname: "", email: "", mesg: "" }) const enteringData = (data) => { const { value, name } = data.target updateData((previousData) => { return { ...previousData, [name]: value } }) } const saveData = () => { console.log(data) let form = new FormData() for (var key in data) { form.append(key, data[key]) } } return ( <>
CONTACT US FIRST NAME * LAST NAME * EMAIL ADREESS * ENTRE YOUR MESSAGE *
